comments.body: Why do some tests put this in `Timer.run()` and some don't? Also why is the `mockLogReader` disposed here, but not in other places?

Removed the last one in attach_test.dart and protocol_discovery_test.dart.  `Timer.run` isn't needed because the throttle transformer already delays the completion of the `Future` more than one microtask.

See `allowDiscovery` global comment.  It's similar to:
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/6beafa7b16064a78a496b2b400e31920ca297c08/packages/flutter_tools/test/general.shard/tester/flutter_tester_test.dart#L43-L46
